divy26:7: yo ’sau svamāṁsatanubhiryajanāni kṛtvā tāvacciraṁ karuṇayā jagato hitāya |
divy26:8: tasya śramasya saphalīkaraṇāya santaḥ saṁmārjitaṁ śṛṇuta sāmpratabhāṣyamāṇam (1)|
divy26:10: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṁ viharatīti sūtraṁ vaktavyam |
divy26:11: atra tāvadbhagavattathāgatavadanāṁmodharavivarapratyudgatavacanasaratsaliladhārāsampātāpanītarāgadveṣamohamadamānamāyāśāṭhyapaṅkapaṭalānāṁ śabdanyāyāditarkaśāstrārthāvalokanotpannaprajñāpradīpaprotsāritakuśāstradarśanāndhakārāṇāṁ saṁsāratṛṣṇāchedipravarasaddharmapayaḥpānaśauṇḍānāṁ gurūṇāṁ saṁnidhau sarvāvavādakaṁ mahātmānamatimāharddhikaṁ sthaviropaguptamārabhya kāṁcideva vibuddhajanamanaḥprasādakarīṁ dharmyāṁ kathāṁ samanusmariṣyāmaḥ |
divy26:14: evamanuśrūyate—yadā bhagavān parinirvāṇakālasamaye palālanāgaṁ vinīya kumbhakārīṁ caṇḍālīṁ gopālīṁ ca, teṣāṁ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ, tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma—asyāmānanda mathurāyāṁ mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya gupto nāma gāndhiko bhaviṣyati |
divy26:15: tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṁ bhavi(kari)ṣyati |
divy26:17: te ’ṣṭādaśahastāmāyāmena dvādaśahastāṁ vistāreṇa caturaṅgalamātrābhiḥ śaṇakābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti |
divy26:18: eṣo ’gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṁ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ |
divy26:19: paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṁ bhadanta |
divy26:21: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati |
divy26:22: so ’tra rurumuṇḍaparvate vihāraṁ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati, upaguptaṁ ca pravrājayiṣyati |
divy26:23: mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau bhaviṣyataḥ |
divy26:25: etadagraṁ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṁ śayyāsanānām yadidaṁ naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanam |
divy26:26: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat—āścaryaṁ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṁ kariṣyati |
divy26:27: bhagavānāha—na ānanda etarhi, yathā atīte ’pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ |
divy26:31: tatra yo ’sau pañcānāṁ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti, tatra gataḥ |
divy26:32: tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ |
divy26:33: sa teṣāṁ pratyekabuddhānāṁ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati |
divy26:34: yadā ca te paryaṅkenopaviṣṭā bhavanti, sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṁ kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṁ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati, yāvat te pratyekabuddhāḥ parinirvṛtāḥ | sa teṣāṁ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati, te na pratigṛhṇanti |
divy26:37: tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṁ pārśvaṁ gato yatra pañca ṛṣiśatāni prativasanti |
divy26:38: te ca ṛṣayaḥ kecit kaṇḍakāpāśrayāḥ, kecidbhasmāpāśrayāḥ, kecidūrdhvahastāḥ, kecit pañcātapāvasthitāḥ |
divy26:44: yadā ca tairīryāpatho vikopito bhavati, tadā sa teṣāmagrataḥ paryaṅkaṁ badhnāti |
divy26:46: tenāpi coktam—paryaṅkena tāvanniṣīdatha, yāvat tāni pañca ṛṣiśatāni paryaṅkenopaviṣṭāni |
divy26:47: te ’nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṁśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṁ bodhiṁ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ |
divy26:48: atha teṣāṁ pratyekabuddhānāmetadabhavat—yat kiṁcidasmābhiḥ śreyo ’vāptam, tatsarvamimaṁ markaṭamāgamya |
divy26:49: tairyāvat sa markaṭaḥ phalamūlaiḥ paripālitaḥ, kālagatasya ca taccharīraṁ gandhakāṣṭhairdhmāpitam |
divy26:51: tatkiṁ manyase ānanda? yo ’sau pañcānāṁ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa eṣa upaguptaḥ |
divy26:52: tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṁ kṛtam |
divy26:53: anāgate ’pyadhvani varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama atraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṁ kariṣyati |
divy26:54: tacca yathaivaṁ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah—yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ, samanvāharati—kimasau gāndhika utpannaḥ, athādyāpi notpadyate iti? paśyatyutpannam |
divy26:55: sa yāvat samanvāharati—yo ’sau tasya putra upagupto nāṁnā alakṣa.ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ, yo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṁ kariṣyatīti, kimasau utpanno ’dyāpi notpadyate? tena yāvadupāyena gupto gāndhiko bhagavacchāsane ’bhiprasāditaḥ |
divy26:56: sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṁbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṁ tasya gṛhaṁ praviṣṭaḥ |
divy26:59: yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṁ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṁ dṛṣṭvā kathayati—na khalu āryasya kaścit paścāccchramaṇah? sthavira uvāca—jarādharmāṇāṁ kuto ’smākaṁ paścācchramaṇo bhavati? yadi kecit śraddhāpurogena pravrajanti, te ’smākaṁ paścācchramaṇā bhavanti |
divy26:60: gupto gāndhika uvāca—ārya, ahaṁ tāvadgṛhavāse parigṛddho viṣayābhirataśca |
divy26:62: api tu yo ’smākaṁ putro bhavati, taṁ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṁ dāsyāmaḥ |
divy26:67: sa yadā mahān saṁvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṁ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca—vatsa, tvayā pratijñātam—yo ’smākaṁ putro bhaviṣyati, taṁ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṁ dāsyāmaḥ |
divy26:71: yo ’smākaṁ dvitīyaḥ putro bhaviṣyati, taṁ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṁ dāsyāmaḥ |
divy26:72: yāvat sthavirah śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati—kimayaṁ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti |
divy26:76: so ’pi yadā mahān saṁvṛttaḥ, tadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṁ gāndhikamuvāca—vatsa, tvayā pratijñātam—yo ’smākaṁ putro bhaviṣyati, taṁ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṁ dāsyāmaḥ |
divy26:79: gāndhika uvāca—ārya marṣaya, eko ’smākaṁ dravyaṁ saṁśayiṣyati, sa āryasya dattaḥ |
divy26:80: yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati—kimayaṁ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti |
divy26:82: yāvadguptasya gāndhikasya tṛtīyaḥ putro jāto ’bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko ’tikrānto mānuṣavarṇamasamprāptaśca divyavarṇam |
divy26:83: tasya vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṁ kṛtvā upagupta iti nāma kṛtam |
divy26:84: so ’pi yadā mahān saṁvṛttaḥ, yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsī guptaṁ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca—vatsa, tvayā pratijñātam—yo ’smākaṁ tṛtīyaḥ putro bhaviṣyati, bayamāryasya dāsyāmaḥ paścācchramaṇārthe |
divy26:89: yadā tena samayaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā māreṇa sarvāvatī mathurā gandhāviṣṭā |
divy26:94: sa dharmeṇa vyavahāraṁ karoti, gandhān vikrīṇīte |
divy26:95: sa sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā abhihitah—vatsa, kīdṛśāste cittacetasikāḥ pravartante kliṣṭā vā akliṣṭā veti? upagupta uvāca—ārya, naiva jānāmi kīdṛśāḥ kliṣṭāścittacetasikāḥ, kīdṛśā akliṣṭā iti |
divy26:96: sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī uvāca—vatsa, yadi kevalaṁ cittaṁ parijñātuṁ na śakyasi, pratipakṣaṁ mocayitum |
divy26:97: tena tasya kṛṣṇikapaṭṭikā dattā pāṇḍurikā ca |
divy26:98: yadi kliṣṭaṁ cittamutpadyate, kṛṣṇikāṁ paṭṭikāṁ sthāpaya |
divy26:100: śubhāṁ manasi kuru, buddhānusmṛtiṁ ca bhāvayasveti tenāsya vyapadiṣṭam |
divy26:101: tasya yāvadārabdhā ākliṣṭāścittacetasikāḥ pravartitum, sa dvau bhāgau kṛṣṇikānāṁ sthāpayati, ekaṁ pāṇḍurikāṇām |
divy26:103: yāvat dvau bhāgau pāṇḍurikāṇāṁ sthāpayati, ekaṁ kṛṣṇikānām |
divy26:104: yāvadanupūrveṇa sarvāṇyeva śuklāni cittānyutpadyante, sa pāṇḍurikāṇāmeva paṭṭikāṁ sthāpayati |
divy26:108: tasyā dāsī upaguptasakāśaṁ gatvā gandhān krīṇāti |
divy26:109: so vāsavadattayā cocyate—dārike, muṣyate sa gāndhikastvayā |
divy26:111: dārikovāca—āryaduhite, upagupto gāndhikadārako rūpasampannaścāturyamādhuryasampannaśca dharmeṇa vyavahāraṁ karori |
divy26:112: śrutvā ca vāsavadattāyā upaguptasakāśe sānurāgaṁ cittamutpannam |
divy26:118: tasyā buddhirutpannā—niyataṁ pañca purāṇaśatāni notsahate dātum |
divy26:119: tayā yāvaddāsī upaguptasakāśaṁ preṣitā—na mamāryaputrasakāśāt kārṣāpaṇenāpi prayojanam |
divy26:124: anyataraśca sārthavāha uttarāpathāt pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyaṁ gṛhītvā mathurāmanuprāptaḥ |
divy26:126: sa pañca puraṇaśatāni gṛhītvā bahūṁśca prābhṛtān vāsavadattāyāḥ sakāśāmabhigataḥ |
divy26:127: tato vāsavadattayā lobhākṛṣṭena taṁ śreṣṭhiputraṁ praghātayitvā^vaskare prakṣipya sārthavāhena saha ratimanubhutā |
divy26:130: tato rājñā abhihitam—gacchantu bhavantaḥ, vāsavadattāṁ hastapādau karṇanāsaṁ ca cchittvā śmaśāne chorayantu |
divy26:131: yāvat tairvāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṁ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā |
divy26:132: yāvadupaguptena śrutam—vāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṁ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā |
divy26:133: tasya buddhirutpannā—pūrvaṁ tayā mama viṣayanimittaṁ darśanamākāṅkṣitam |
divy26:134: idānīṁ tu tasyā hastapādau karṇanāsaṁ ca vikārtitau, idānīṁ tu tasyā darśanakāla iti |
divy26:136: mokṣārthināṁ janmaparānmukhānāṁ śreyastadāsyāstu na darśanaṁ syāt (2)|
divy26:137: idānīṁ tu tasyāḥ kāle ’yaṁ draṣṭuṁ gatamānarāgaharṣāyāḥ |
divy26:140: tasyāśca preṣikā pūrvaguṇānurāgāt samīpe ’vasthitā kākādīn nivārayati |
divy26:141: tayā ca vāsavadattāyā niveditam—āryaduhitaḥ, yasya tvayā ahaṁ sakāśaṁ punaḥ punaranupreṣitā, ayaṁ sa upagupto ’bhyagataḥ |
divy26:143: śrutvā ca vāsavadattā kathayati— pranaṣṭaśobhāṁ duḥkhārtāṁ bhūmau rudhirapiñjarām |
divy26:145: tataḥ preṣikāmuvāca—yau hastapādau karṇanāsaṁ ca maccharīrādvikartitau, tau śleṣayeti |
divy26:148: tato vāsavadattā upaguptamagrataḥ sthitaṁ dṛṣṭvā kathayati—āryaputra, yadā maccharīraṁ svasthabhūtaṁ viṣayaratyanukūlaṁ tadā mayā āryaputrasya punaḥ punardūtī visarjitā |
divy26:150: idānīṁ mama hastapādau karṇanāsau ca vikartitau, svarudhirakardama evāvasthitā |
divy26:151: idānīṁ kimāgato ’si? āha ca— idam yadā paṅkajagarbhakomalaṁ mahārhavastrābharaṇairvibhūṣitam |
divy26:152: babhūva gātraṁ mama darśanakṣamaṁ tadā na dṛṣṭo ’si mayālpabhāgyayā (5)|
divy26:153: etarhi kiṁ draṣṭumihāgato ’si yadā śarīraṁ mama darśanākṣamam |
divy26:155: upagupta uvāca— nāhaṁ bhagini kāmārtaḥ saṁnidhāvāgatastava |
divy26:158: nirīkṣyamāṇā api yatnavadbhir nāpyatra dṛṣṭāsi bhavedyathāvat (8)|
divy26:159: idaṁ tu rūpaṁ tava dṛśyametat sthitaṁ svabhāve racanādviyuktam |
divy26:160: te ’paṇḍitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ye prākṛte ’smin kuṇape ramante (9)|
divy26:162: śirāsahasraiśca vṛte samantāt ko nāma rajyeta itaḥ śarīre (10)|
divy26:168: iha hi— daurgandhyaṁ prativāryate bahuvidhairgandhairamedhyākarairvaikṛtyaṁ bahirādhriyeta vividhairvastrādibhirbhūṣaṇaiḥ |
divy26:170: saṁbuddhasya tu ye vacaḥ suvacasaḥ śṛṇvanti kurvantyapi te kāmāñ śramaśokaduḥkhajananān sadbhiḥ sadā garhitān |
divy26:171: tyaktvā kāmanimittamuktamanasaḥ śānte vane nirgatāḥ pāram yānti bhavārṇavasya mahataḥ saṁśritya mārgaplavam (14)|
divy26:173: buddhaguṇānusmaraṇāccāvarjitahṛdayovāca— evametattathā sarvam yathā vadasi paṇḍita |
divy26:174: me tvāṁ sādhuṁ samāsādya buddhasya vacanaṁ śrutam (15)|
divy26:175: yāvadupaguptena vāsavadattāyā anupūrvikāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyāni saṁprakāśitāni |
divy26:177: tenātmīyayā dharmadeśanayā sahasatyābhisamayādanāgāmiphalaṁ vāsavadattayā ca srotāpattiphalaṁ prāptam |
divy26:178: tato vāsavadattā dṛṣṭasatyā upaguptaṁ saṁrāgayantyuvāca— tavānubhāvātpihitaḥ sughoro hyapāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
divy26:181: eṣāhaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ tathāgatamarhantaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ cetyāha— eṣā vrajāmi śaraṇaṁ vibuddhanavakamalavimaladhavalanetram |
divy26:182: tamamarabudhajanamahitaṁ jinaṁ virāgaṁ ca saṁghaṁ ca (17)|
divy26:185: yāvadupagupto vāsavadattāṁ dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya prakrāntaḥ |
divy26:187: devataiśca mathurāyāmārocitam—vāsavadattayā upaguptasakāśāddharmadeśanāṁ śrutvā āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, deveṣūpapanneti |
divy26:188: śrutvā ca mathurāvāsatavyena janakāyena vāsavadattāyāḥ śarīre pūjā kṛtā |
divy26:190: yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṁ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca—anujānīhi upaguptaṁ pravrājayiṣyāmīti |
divy26:192: yadā na lābho na cchedo bhaviṣyati, tadā anujñāsyāmīti |
divy26:193: yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsinā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā   na lābho na cchedaḥ |
divy26:194: tato gupto gāndhiko gaṇayati, tulayati, māpayati, paśyati—na lābho na cchedaḥ |
divy26:195: tataḥ sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṁ gāndhikamuvāca—ayaṁ hi bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṁ kariṣyatīti |
divy26:198: tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā upagupto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanaṁ nītaḥ, upasampāditaśca |
divy26:201: tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinābhihitam—vatsa upagupta, tvaṁ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ, yo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṁ kariṣyatīti |
divy26:202: eṣo ’gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ |
divy26:206: mathurāyāṁ ca śabdo visṛtah—upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho ’dya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyatīti |
divy26:208: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samāpadyāvalokayati—kathaṁ tathāgatena pariṣaṇṇā? paśyati cārdhacandrākāreṇa parṣadavasthitā |
divy26:209: yāvadavalokayati—kathaṁ tathāgatena dharmadeśanā kṛtā? paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā |
divy26:210: so ’pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṁ kartumārabdhaḥ |
divy26:211: māreṇa ca tasyāṁ parṣadi muktāhāravarṣamutsṛṣṭam, vaineyānāṁ manāṁsi vyākulīkṛtāni, ekenāpi satyadarśanaṁ na kṛtam |
divy26:212: yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati—kenāyaṁ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa |
divy26:214: upagupto dharmaṁ deśayati, muktāhāraṁ ca varṣopavarṣitamiti |
divy26:215: yāvat dvitīye ’pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṁ māreṇa cāsyāṁ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam, vaineyānāṁ manāṁsi saṁlakṣobhitāni, ekenāpi satyadarśanaṁ na kṛtam |
divy26:216: yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati—kenāyaṁ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa pāpīyaseti |
divy26:217: yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ |
divy26:218: upagupto dharmaṁ deśayati, muktāvarṣaṁ suvarṇavarṣaṁ ca patatīti |
divy26:219: yāvat tṛtīye ’pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṁprakāśayitum |
divy26:221: divyāni ca vādyāni saṁpravāditāni, divyāścāpsaraso nāṭayituṁ pravṛttāḥ |
divy26:222: yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṁśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ |
divy26:224: praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā |
divy26:226: tasya buddhirutpannā—ayaṁ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṁ vyākṣepaṁ karoti |
divy26:227: kimarthamayaṁ bhagavatā na vinītah? paśyati mamāyaṁ vineyaḥ |
divy26:228: tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṁ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
divy26:229: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati—kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti? paśyati—vinayakāla upasthitaḥ |
divy26:230: tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh—ahikṛṇapaṁ kurkurakuṇapaṁ manuṣyakuṇapam |
divy26:232: dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā—upagupto ’pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti |
divy26:235: tataḥ sthaviropaguptenāhikuṇapaṁ mārasya baddham, kurkurakuṇapaṁ grīvāyām, karṇavasaktaṁ manuṣyakuṇapaṁ ca |
divy26:236: tataḥ samālabhyovāca— bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā |
divy26:238: yatte balaṁ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato ’si |
divy26:241: paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṁ na śaśāka |
divy26:242: asamartho vaihāyasamutpatyovāca— yadi moktuṁ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṁ svayam |
divy26:244: sthavira uvāca— brahmāṇaṁ śaraṇaṁ śatakratuṁ vā dīptaṁ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṁ vā |
divy26:245: na kledaṁ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṁ na bhedaṁ kaṇṭhasthaṁ kuṇapamidaṁ tu yāsyatīha (21)|
divy26:247: tena coktah—marṣaya vatsa,  śiṣyeṇa daśabalasya svayamṛddhyā kṛtāntamaryādā |
divy26:251: kāmaṁ mamāpi mahadasti balaṁ tathāpi nāhaṁ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ |
divy26:252: tejasvināṁ na khalu na jvalane ’sti kiṁ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā (24)|
divy26:253: māro ’bravīt—kimidānīmājñāpayasi? kaṁ śaraṇaṁ vrajāmīti? brahmābravīt— śaghrīṁ tameva śaraṇaṁ vraja yaṁ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ (25)|
divy26:254: atha mārastathāgataśiṣyasāmarthyamupalabhya cintayāmāsa— brahmaṇā pūjyate yasya śiṣyāṇāmapi śāsanam |
divy26:255: tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṁ ko nu śaknuyāt (26)|
divy26:259: mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṁ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṁ śrāvitaḥ (28)|
divy26:260: atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca—bhadanta, kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah? śālāyāṁ brāhmaṇagrāme māmāsādya sa gautamaḥ |
divy26:263: sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṁ tena hiṁsitaḥ (30)|
divy26:264: tvayā punarahaṁ vīra tyaktvā (tu) sahajāṁ dāyām |
divy26:266: sthaviro ’bravīt—pāpīyan, kathamaparīkṣyaiva tathāgatamāhātmyeṣyu śrāvakamupasaṁharasi— kiṁ sarṣapeṇa samatāṁ nayasīha meruṁ khadyotakena raviṁ maṇḍalinā samudram |
divy26:267: anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahākaruṇāsti saumya (32)|
divy26:268: api ca— yadarthena bhagavatā sāparodho ’pi marṣitaḥ |
divy26:270: māra uvāca— brūhi brūhi śrīmatastasya bhāvaṁ saṅgaṁ chettuṁ kṣāntiguptavratasya |
divy26:271: yo ’sau mohānnityamāyāsito me tenāhaṁ ca prekṣito maitryeṇaiva (34)|
divy26:272: sthavira uvāca—śṛṇu saumya, tvaṁ hi bhagavatyasakṛdasakṛdavaskhalitaḥ |
divy26:273: na ca buddhāvropitānāmakuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāmanyat prakṣālanamanyatra tathāgataprasādādeva |
divy26:275: tvaṁ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ (35)|
divy26:276: nyāyenānena bhaktistava hṛdi janitā tenāgramatinā svalpāpi hyatra bhaktirbhavati matimatāṁ nirvāṇaphaladā |
divy26:277: saṁkṣepādyatkṛtaṁ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṁ prakṣālitaṁ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ (36)|
divy26:278: atha māraḥ kadambapuṣpavadāhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sarvāṅgena praṇipatyovāca— sthāne mayā bahuvidhaṁ parikhedito ’sau prāk siddhitaśca bhuvi siddhamanorathena |
divy26:279: sarvaṁ ca marṣitamṛṣipravareṇa tena putrāparādha iva sānunayena pitrā (37)|
divy26:280: sa buddhaprasādāpyāyitamanāḥ suciraṁ buddhaguṇānanusmṛtya sthavirasya padayor nipatyovāca— anugraho paraḥ kṛtastvayā niveśitam yanmayi buddhagauravam |
divy26:281: idaṁ tu kaṇṭhavyavalambi maitryā maharṣikopābharaṇaṁ visarjaya (38)|
divy26:283: māra uvāca—kaḥ samaya iti? sthavira uvāca—adyaprabhṛti bhikṣavo na viheṭhayitavyā iti |
divy26:285: kamaparamājñāpayasīti? sthavira uvāca—evaṁ tāvacchāsanakāryaṁ prati mamājñā |
divy26:287: tato māraḥ sasambhrama uvāca—prasīda sthavira, kimājñāpayasi? sthaviro ’bravīt—svayamavagacchasi—yadahaṁ varṣaśataparinirvṛte bhagavati pravrajitaḥ, taddharmakāyo mayā tasya dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy26:288: trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me |
divy26:290: 226.003, priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṁ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham (39)|
divy26:291: māra uvāca—tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām |
divy26:294: buddhānusmṛtipeśalena manasā pūjām yadi tvaṁ mayi svalpāmapyupadarśayiṣyasi vibho dagdho bhaviṣyāmyaham |
divy26:295: kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṁ soḍhuṁ praṇāmakriyāṁ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ (41)|
divy26:298: māro ’bravīt—tena hi muhūrtamāgamaya, yāvadahaṁ vanagahanamanupraviśya— śūraṁ vañcayituṁ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṁ bauddhaṁ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam |
divy26:299: kṛtvā rūpamahaṁ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṁ dehināmeṣo ’pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṁ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan (42)|
divy26:300: atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṁ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko ’vasthitaḥ |
divy26:301: māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṁ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum |
divy26:305: atha vyāmaprabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitamasecanakadarśanaṁ bhagavato rūpamabhinirmāya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaviraśāradvatīputraṁ vāmapārśve sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ pṛṣṭhataścāyuṣmantamānandaṁ buddhapātravyagrahastaṁ sthaviramahākaśyapāniruddhasubhūtipramṛtīnāṁ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṁ rūpāṇyabhinirmāya ardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśatairardhacandreṇānuparivṛtaṁ buddhaveṣamādarśayitvā māraḥ sthaviropaguptasyāntikamājagāma |
divy26:307: sa pramuditamanāstvaritamāsanādutthāya nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca—dhigastu tāṁ niṣkaruṇāmanityatāṁ bhinatti rūpāṇi yadīdṛśānyapi |
divy26:309: sa buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā tathāpyāsaktamanāḥ saṁvṛtto yathā buddhaṁ bhagavantamahaṁ paśyāmīti vyaktamupāgataḥ |
divy26:311: kiṁ bahunā? vaktreṇābhibhavatyayaṁ hi kamalaṁ nīlotpalaṁ cakṣuṣā kāntyā puṣpavanaṁ ghanaṁ priyatayā candraṁ samāptadyutim |
divy26:312: gāmbhīryeṇa mahodadhiṁ sthiratayā meruṁ raviṁ tejasā gatyā siṁhamavekṣitena vṛṣabhaṁ varṇena cāmīkaram (45)|
divy26:313: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā harṣaṇāpūryamāṇahṛdayo vyāpinā svareṇovāca— aho bhāvaviśuddhānāṁ karmaṇo madhuraṁ phalam |
divy26:316: tenedaṁ jananetrakāntamamalaṁ rūpaṁ samutthāpitam yaṁ dṛṣṭvā ripurapyabhipramuditaḥ syātkiṁ punarmadvidhaḥ (47)|
divy26:317: saṁbuddhālambanaiḥ saṁjñāṁ vismṛtya buddhasaṁjñāmadhiṣṭhāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa mārasya pādayor nipatitaḥ |
divy26:318: atha māraḥ sasambhramo ’bravīt—evaṁ taṁ bhadanta nārhasi samayaṁ vyatikramitum |
divy26:319: sthavira uvāca—kaḥ samaya iti? māra uvāca—nanu pratijñātaṁ bhadantena—nāhaṁ bhavantaṁ praṇamiṣyāmīti |
divy26:320: tataḥ sthaviropaguptaḥ pṛthivītalādutthāya sagadgadakaṇṭho ’bravīt—pāpīyan, na khalu na viditaṁ me yasya vādipradhāno jalavihata ivāgnir nirvṛtiṁ saṁprayātaḥ |
divy26:321: api tu nayanakāntāmākṛtiṁ tasya dṛṣṭvā tamṛṣimabhinato ’haṁ tvāṁ tu nābhyarcayāmi (48)|
divy26:322: māra uvāca—kathamihāhaṁ nārcito bhavāmi, yadevaṁ māṁ praṇamasīti |
divy26:323: sthaviro ’bravīt—śrūyatām, yathā tvaṁ naiva mayā abhyarcito bhavasi, na ca mayā samayātikramaḥ kṛta iti |
divy26:329: yāvaccaturthe divase māraḥ svayameva mathurāyāṁ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣitumārabdhah—yo yuṣmākaṁ svargāpavargasukhaṁ prārthayate, sa sthaviroaguptasakāśāddharmaṁ śṛṇotu, yaiśca yuṣmābhistathāgato na dṛṣṭaste sthaviropaguptaṁ paśyantu iti |
divy26:330: āha ca— utsṛjya dāridryamanarthamūlam yaḥ sphītaśobhāṁ śriyamicchatīha |
divy26:331: svargāpavargāya ca yasya vāñchā sa śraddhayā dharmamataḥ śṛṇotu (51)|
divy26:332: dṛṣṭo na yairvā dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ |
divy26:334: yāvanmathurāyāṁ śabdo visṛtah—sthaviropaguptena māro vinīta iti |
divy26:335: śrutvā ca yadbhūyasā mathurāvāstavyo janakāyaḥ sthaviropaguptasakāśaṁ nirgataḥ |
divy26:336: tataḥ sthaviropagupto ’nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṁnipatiteṣu siṁha iva nirbhīḥ siṁhāsanamabhirūḍhaḥ |
divy26:337: vakṣyati ca— māṁ prati na te śakyaṁ siṁhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum |
divy26:338: yaḥ sa siṁhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṁkocam (53)|
divy26:339: siṁha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham |
divy26:341: yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṁ kathāṁ kṛtvā satyāni saṁprakāśitāni |
divy26:343: kaiścidanāgāmiphalaṁ prāptam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścit srotāapattiphalam, yāvadaṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi pravrajitāni |
divy26:346: tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā vistāreṇa |
divy26:347: yadā te kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ saṁvṛttāstadā sthaviropaguptenābhihitam—yo madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyati, tena caturaṅgulamātrā śalākā guhāyāṁ prakṣeptavyā |
divy26:349: tasya yāvadāsamudrāyām pṛthivyām śabdo visṛtah—mathurāyāmupaguptanāmā avavādakānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā |
divy26:350: tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte suramanujamahoragāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvavidyādharārcitapādayugme pūrvabuddhakṣotrāvaropitakuśalabījasaṁtatīnāmanekeṣāṁ sattvaśatasahasrāṇāṁ saddharmasalilavarṣadhārānipātena mokṣāṅkurānabhivardhayannurumuṇḍe śaile |
divy26:353: ityevamanuśrūyate— bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalindakanivāpe |
divy26:354: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy26:358: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṁskāraṁ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti, tadā citrāṇyadbhutāni prādurbhavanti |
divy26:364: vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṁ samāgacchanti |
divy26:365: hastinas trośanti, aśvā heṣante, ṛṣabhā garjanti, śukaśārikakokilajīvaṁjīvakabarhiṇo madhurān śabdān nikūjanti |
divy26:367: aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṁ śabdaṁ niścārayanti |
divy26:370: iyaṁ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṁ prakampate |
divy26:371: tadyathā—pūrvo digbhāga unnamati paścimo ’vanamati, anto ’vanamati madhya unnamati, calitaḥ pracalito vedhitaḥ pravedhitaḥ |
divy26:372: itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe |
divy26:373: vakṣyati ca— lavaṇajalanivāsinī tato vā nagaranigamamaṇḍitā saśailā |
divy26:375: atha buddhapraveśakālaniyataiḥ prātihāryairāvarhjitāḥ strīmanuṣyāstannagaramanilabalacalitabhinnavīcītaraṅgakṣubhitamiva mahāsamudraṁ vimuktoccanādaṁ babhūva |
divy26:378: vakṣyati ca—niṁnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca |
divy26:379: andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṁ saṁvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ (57)|
divy26:380: sarvaṁ ca tannagaraṁ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṁ babhūva |
divy26:381: āha ca— sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṁ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham |
divy26:382: saṁprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṁ surāsuranaraṁ hi samuktabhāvam (58)|
divy26:388: yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṁ dāsyāmīti pāṁśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ, vijayena ca kṛtāñjalinābhyanumoditam |
divy26:389: vakṣyati ca— dṛṣṭvā mahākāruṇikaṁ svayambhavaṁ vyāmaprabhoddyotitasarvagātram |
divy26:390: dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṁśuṁ dadau jātijarāntakāya (59)|
divy26:391: sa bhagavate pratipādayitvā praṇidhānaṁ kartumārabdhah—anenāhaṁ kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṁ pṛthivyāṁ rājā syām, atraiva ca buddhe kārāṁ kuryāmiti |
divy26:392: tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṁ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṁ ca buddhvā |
divy26:393: iṣṭaṁ phalaṁ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṁśuṁ karuṇāyamānaḥ (60)|
divy26:396: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ vidarśayanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātamañjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatavarṇā arciṣo mukhānniścaranti |
divy26:398: ye ’dho gacchanti, te saṁjīvaṁ kālasūtraṁ saṁghātaṁ rauravaṁ mahārauravaṁ tapanaṁ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti, ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti |
divy26:400: teṣāmevaṁ bhavati—kiṁ nu bhavanto vayamitaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti, yenāsmākaṁ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhāḥ |
divy26:405: te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṁdhiṁ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṁ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
divy26:406: ye ūrddhvato gacchanti, te cāturmahārājikān devāṁstrāyastriṁśān yāmāṁstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmān parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyanteṣu deveṣu gatvā anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti |
divy26:407: gāthādvayaṁ ca bhāṣante— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy26:412: yadi bhagavānatītaṁ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, pṛṣṭhato ’ntardhīyante |
divy26:424: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale ’ntarhitāḥ |
divy26:425: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo gāthāṁ bhāsate— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhā jagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy26:426: nākāraṇaṁ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṁ smitaṁ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ (36)|
divy26:427: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy26:433: api tu sahetu sapratyayaṁ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitamupadarśayanti |
divy26:434: paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṁśvañjaliḥ prakṣiptah? evaṁ bhadanta |
divy26:435: ayamānanda dārako ’nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṁnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā, yo me śarīradhātūn vaistārikān kariṣyati |
divy26:438: āha ca— astaṁgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo ’sau hyaśoka iti nāma viśālakīrtiḥ |
divy26:440: ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṁśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ |
divy26:441: yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṁ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ |
divy26:442: gomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṁkrame tathāgataścaṁkramyate, tatra gomayakārṣīṁ prayacchati |
divy26:443: yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṁ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṁkramati bhagavān, tatra gomayakārṣī dattā |
divy26:445: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṁ kārayati |
divy26:456: pāṭaliputre nagare biṁdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati |
divy26:459: tena ca samayena campāyāṁ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ |
divy26:460: tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī |
divy26:461: sā naimittikairvyākṛtā—āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati |
divy26:466: sa tāṁ duhitaraṁ grahāya pāṭaliputraṁ gataḥ |
divy26:467: tena sā sarvālaṁkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā—iyaṁ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti |
divy26:470: yadi rājā anayā sārdhaṁ paricārayiṣyati, asmākaṁ bhūyaścakṣuḥsampreṣaṇamapi na kariṣyati |
divy26:472: sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṁ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṁvṛttā |
divy26:473: yadā ārabhate rājñaḥ keśaśmaśrum, tadā rājā śete |
divy26:474: yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā—kiṁ tvaṁ varamicchasīti? tayā abhihitam—devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt |
divy26:475: rājā āha—tvaṁ nāpinī, ahaṁ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ |
divy26:476: kathaṁ mayā sārdhaṁ samāgamo bhaviṣyati? sā kathayati—deva nāhaṁ nāpinī, api tu brāhmaṇasyāhaṁ duhitā |
divy26:478: rājā kathayati—kena tvaṁ nāpitakarma śikṣāpitā? sā kathayati—antaḥpurikābhiḥ |
divy26:485: tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṁ kṛtvā kiṁ kumārasya bhavatu nāma? sā kathayati—asya dārakasya aśokāsmi saṁvṛttā |
divy26:491: atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṁ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṁ parivrājakamāmantrayate—upādhyāya, kumārāṁstāvatparīkṣāmah—kaḥ śakyate śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṁ kārayitum? piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati—tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṁ nirgaccha, parīkṣāmaḥ |
divy26:493: yāvadaśokaḥ kumāro mātrā cocyate—vatsa, rājā kumārān parīkṣitukāmaḥ suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṁ gataḥ, tvamapi tatra gaccheti |
divy26:494: aśokaḥ kathayati—rājño ’hamanabhipreto darśanenāpi, kimahaṁ tatra gāmiṣyāmi? sā kathayati—tathāpi gaccheti |
divy26:496: yāvadaśokaḥ pāṭaliputrānnirgacchati, rādhaguptena cāgrāmātyaputreṇoktah—aśoka, kva gamiṣyasīti? aśokaḥ kathayati—rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati |
divy26:498: yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake ’bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṁ gatvā kumārāṇāṁ madhye ’tra pṛthivyāṁ prastīrya niṣasāda |
divy26:501: tato rājñā bindusāreṇa piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājako ’bhihitah—upādhyāya, parīkṣa kumārān—kaḥ śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṁ kartumiti? paśyati piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ, cintayati ca—aśoko rājā bhaviṣyati |
divy26:503: yadi kathayiṣyāmi aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti, nāsti me jīvitam |
divy26:506: āha—yasya yānaṁ śobhanaṁ sa rājā bhaviṣyati |
divy26:510: mama yānaṁ śobhanam, ahaṁ rājā bhaviṣyāmīti |
divy26:512: piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati—deva, yasyāsanamagram, sa rājā bhaviṣyati |
divy26:517: yāvadaśoko mātrocyate—ko vyākṛto rājā bhaviṣyatīti? aśokaḥ kathayati—abhedena vyākṛtam—yasya yānamagramāsanaṁ pānaṁ bhājanaṁ ceti, sa rājā bhaviṣyatīti |
divy26:519: mama hastiskandham yānaṁ pṛthivī āsanaṁ mṛṇmayaṁ bhājanaṁ śālyodanaṁ dadhivyañjanaṁ pānīyaṁ pānamiti |
divy26:521: tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti tasya mātaramārabdhaḥ sevitum |
divy26:522: yāvat tayocyate—upādhyāya, kataraḥ kumāro rājño bindusārasyātyayādrājā bhaviṣyatīti? āha—aśokaḥ |
divy26:526: yadā śṛṇoṣi aśoko rājā saṁvṛttāḥ, tadā āgantavyam |
divy26:529: atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṁ viruddham |
divy26:530: tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah—gaccha kumāra, takṣaśilānagaraṁ saṁnāhaya |
divy26:531: caturaṅgaṁ balakāyaṁ dattam, yānaṁ praharaṇaṁ ca pratiṣiddham |
divy26:532: yāvadaśokaḥ kumāraḥ pāṭaliputrānnirgacchan bhṛtyairvijñaptah—kumāra, naivāsmākaṁ sainyapraharaṇam—kena vayaṁ kam yudhyāmah? tatah aśokenābhihitam—yadi nāma rājyavipākyaṁ kuśalamasti, sainyaṁ praharaṇaṁ ca prādurbhavatu |
divy26:536: śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge śobhāṁ kṛtvā pūrṇaghaṭamādāya pratyudgatāḥ |
divy26:537: pratyudgamya ca kathayanti—na vayaṁ kumārasya viruddhāḥ, nāpi rājño bindusārasya, api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṁ paribhavaṁ kurvanti |
divy26:541: tena tau vṛttyā saṁvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṁchindantau saṁprasthitau |
divy26:545: yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṁ praviśati |
divy26:547: tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā |
divy26:549: yadā rājā bhaviṣyati, tadā śastraṁ pātayiṣyati |
divy26:550: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati |
divy26:559: yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṁ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti—aśokaḥ kumāro glānībhūta iti |
divy26:560: yadā bindusāraḥ svalpāvaśeṣaprāṇaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ, tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṁkārairbhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasyopanītah—imaṁ tāvadrājye pratiṣṭhāpaya |
divy26:561: yadā susīma āgato bhaviṣyati, tadā taṁ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ |
divy26:563: aśokena cābhihitam—yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṁ bhavati, devatā mama paṭṭaṁ bandhantu |
divy26:565: taṁ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṁ śoṇitaṁ mukhādāgatam yāvatkālagataḥ |
divy26:566: yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ, tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṁ nāgāḥ |
divy26:568: susīmenāpi śrutam—bindusāro rājā kālagataḥ, aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
divy26:571: aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ, dvitīye dvitīyaḥ, tṛtīye rādhaguptaḥ, pūrvadvāre svayameva rājā aśoko ’vasthitaḥ |
divy26:572: rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ |
divy26:573: aśokasya ca pratimāṁ parikhāṁ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṁśunākīrṇā |
divy26:578: yadā ca susīmaḥ praghātitaḥ, tasyāpi mahānagno bhadrāyudho nāṁnā anekasahasraparivāraḥ, sa bhagavacchāsane pravrajito ’rhan saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy26:580: yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate |
divy26:581: tenāmātyānāmabhihitam—bhavantaḥ, puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṁśca cchittvā kaṇṭakavṛkṣān paripālayatha |
divy26:582: amātyā āhuh—devena kutra dṛṣṭam? api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṁś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṁśca paripālayitavyam |
divy26:583: tairyāvat trirapi rājña ājñā pratikūlitā, tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṁ niṣkośaṁ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṁ śiraṁsi cchinnāni |
divy26:584: yāvadrājā aśoko ’pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṁ gataḥ |
divy26:585: tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy26:586: tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ |
divy26:589: yāvadrājā śayitaḥ, tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ |
divy26:590: yāvadrājñā pratibuddhena so ’śokavṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, pṛṣṭaśca—kena tacchinnam? te kathayanti—deva, antaḥpurikābhiriti |
divy26:591: śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṁveṣṭya dagdhāni |
divy26:592: tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ |
divy26:594: api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ, ye devasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṁ śodhayiṣyanti |
divy26:600: caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṁ pitaraṁ ca paribhāṣate, dārakadārikāśca tāḍayati, pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṁśca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati |
divy26:601: caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṁ kṛtam |
divy26:603: sa tairabhihitah—śakyase rājño ’śokasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṁ kartum? sa āha—kṛtsnasya jambudvīpasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṁ sādhayiṣyāmīti |
divy26:612: evam yāvadrājapuruṣairabhihitah—kimarthaṁ cireṇābhyāgato ’si? tena caitatprakaraṇaṁ vistareṇārocitam |
divy26:617: sa āha—deva, varaṁ me prayaccha, yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti |
divy26:622: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṁ bhūmau ādīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṁ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān saṁprajvalitānekajvālībhūtānāsye prakṣipānti, ye teṣāṁ sattvānāmoṣṭhau api dahanti, jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati |
divy26:623: evaṁ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ |
divy26:624: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṁ bhūmau ādīptāyāṁ pradīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṁ viṣkambhya kvathitaṁ tāmramāsye prakṣipanti, yatteṣāṁ sattvānāmoṣṭhāvapi dahati, jihvāmapi tālvapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhanālamapi, antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati |
divy26:626: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṁ bhūmau ādīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāmavānmukhān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena sūtreṇādīptena saṁprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtenāskphāṭya ayomayena kuṭhāreṇādīptena saṁpradīptena saṁprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtena takṣaṇuvanti saṁtakṣṇuvanti saṁpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṁśamapi ṣaḍaṁśamapi ṣaḍaṁśamapi caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti |
divy26:628: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṁ bhūmau ādīptāyāṁ pradīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmavanmukhān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena ayomayena sūtreṇādīptena pradīptena saṁprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtenāsphāṭya ayomayyāṁ bhūmyāmāadīptāyāṁ pradīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāṁ takṣṇuvanti saṁtakṣṇuvanti saṁparitakṣṇuvanti, aṣṭāṁśamapi ṣaḍaṁśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti |
divy26:630: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṁ bhūmāvādīptāyāṁ pradīptāyāṁ saṁprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya pañcaviṣaṭabandhanāṁ kāraṇāṁ kārayanti, ubhayorhastayorāyasau kīlau trāmanti, ubhayoḥ pādayorāyase kīle trāmanti, madhye hṛdayasyāyasaṁ kīlaṁ krāmanti |
divy26:632: evaṁ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum |
divy26:634: yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ |
divy26:641: sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
divy26:643: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṁ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
divy26:650: tenocyate—kimidaṁ bāladāraka iva rudasīti? sa bhikṣuḥ prāha— na śarīravināśaṁ hi śocāmi sarvaśaḥ |
divy26:652: durlabhaṁ prāpya mānuṣyaṁ pravrajyāṁ ca sukhodayām |
divy26:657: tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṁ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat |
divy26:659: sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyatamatiḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy26:661: atha saptame divase ’śokasya rājño ’ntaḥpurikāṁ kumāreṇa saha saṁraktāṁ nirīkṣamāṇāṁ saṁlapantīṁ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṁ cārakamanupreṣitau |
divy26:663: tato bhikṣustau dṛṣṭvā saṁvignaḥ prāha— aho kāruṇikaḥ śāstā samyagāha mahāmuniḥ |
divy26:665: kva tadvadanakāntitvaṁ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā |
divy26:669: tena tāṁ rajanīṁ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane |
divy26:671: tatastasmin najanīkṣaye sa bhikṣuścaṇḍagirikenocyate—bhikṣo, nirgatā rātriḥ |
divy26:674: tato bhikṣurāha—dīrghāyuḥ, mamāpi nirgatā rātriḥ, udita ādityaḥ |
divy26:679: tato bhikṣurāha— mamāpi hṛdayāddhorā nirgatā mohaśarvatī |
divy26:685: tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṁ sthālyāṁ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṁkulāyāṁ mahālohyāṁ prakṣiptaḥ |
divy26:689: ) yadā tadāpi na prajvalati, tato vicārya tāṁ lohīm, paśyati taṁ bhikṣuṁ pādmasyopari paryaṅkenopaviṣṭam |
divy26:691: atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṁnipatiteṣu sa bhikṣurvaineyakālamavekṣamāṇah—riddhiṁ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṁ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ |
divy26:692: nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṁ haṁsa ivotpapāt (76)|
divy26:694: vakṣyati hi— ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca |
divy26:695: varṣañ jvalaṁścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva śailaḥ (77)|
divy26:698: manuṣyatulyaṁ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya |
divy26:699: na niścayaṁ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva (79)|
divy26:700: tatsāmprataṁ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam |
divy26:701: jñātvā ca te dharmaguṇaprabhāvān yathābalaṁ śiṣyavadācareyam (80)|
divy26:702: tato bhikṣuḥ pravacanaparigrāhako ’yaṁ bhaviṣyati, bhagavaddhātuṁ ca vistarīṁ kariṣyati, mahājanahitārthaṁ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṁstamuvāca— ahaṁ mahākāruṇikasya rājan prahīṇasarvāśravabandhanasya |
divy26:703: buddhasya putro vadatāṁ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ (81)|
divy26:704: dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṁ gatenāpi śamaṁ praṇītaḥ |
divy26:707: mahārāja, tvaṁ bhagavatā vyākṛtah—varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare ’śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dharmarājaḥ, yo me śarīradhātūn vaistārikān kariṣyati, caturaśītiṁ dharmarājikāsahasraṁ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati |
divy26:708: idaṁ ca devena narakasadṛśaṁ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante |
divy26:709: tadarhasi deva sarvasattvebhyo ’bhayapradānaṁ dātum, bhagavataśca manorathaṁ paripūrayitum |
divy26:710: āha ca— tasmānnarendra abhayaṁ prayaccha sattveṣu kāruṇyapurojaveṣu |
divy26:711: nāthasya saṁpūrya manorathaṁ ca vistārikān dharmadharān kuruṣva (83)|
divy26:712: atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṁ bhikṣuṁ kṣamayannuvāca— daśabalasuta kṣantumarhasīmaṁ ca tavādya deśayāmi |
divy26:713: śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṁ ca buddhaṁ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṁ ca dharmam (84)|
divy26:714: api ca— karomi caiṣa vyavasāyamadya taṁ tadgauravattātpravaṇaprasādāt |
divy26:722: rājā āha—ko ’smākaṁ prathamataraṁ praviṣṭah? caṇḍagirika uvāca—aham |
divy26:728: tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṁ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṁ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṁ gṛhītavān |
divy26:729: yatroddhāraṇaṁ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṁśaṁ datvā stūpaṁ pratiṣṭhāpya evaṁ dvitīyaṁ stūpaṁ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṁśca pratiṣṭhāpya rāmagrāmaṁ gataḥ |
divy26:730: tato rājā nāgair nāgabhavanamavatāritaḥ, vijñaptaśca—vayamasyātraiva pūjāṁ kariṣyāma iti |
divy26:733: vakṣyati hi— rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṁ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṁ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ |
divy26:734: dhātūnyetasmānnopalebhe sa rājā śraddhābhū(?) rājā cintayati yastvetatkṛtvā jagāma (86)|
divy26:735: yāvadrājā caturaśītikaraṇḍasahasraṁ kārayitvā sauvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṁ teṣu dhātavaḥ prakṣiptaḥ |
divy26:736: evaṁ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṁ paṭṭasahasraṁ ca yakṣāṇāṁ haste datvā visarjitam—āsamudrāyāṁ pṛthivyāṁ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate, tatra dharmarājikāṁ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyam |
divy26:740: rājā cintayati—na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti |
divy26:743: vistareṇa yāvadrājñā abhihitam—yatrādhikatarā bhavanti, yatra ca nyūnatarāḥ, tatra na dātavyam |
divy26:745: yāvadrājā kurkuṭārāmaṁ gatvā sthavirayaśasamabhigamyovāca—ayaṁ me manorathah—ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṁ pratiṣṭhāpayeyamiti |
divy26:747: ahaṁ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṁ praticchādayiṣyāmīti |
divy26:748: yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṁ praticchāditam |
divy26:750: vakṣyati ca—tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṁ tasya ṛṣeḥ sa hyupādāya mauryaḥ |
divy26:751: cakre stūpānāṁ śāradābhraprabhānāṁ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā sahasram (87)|
divy26:752: yāvacca rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṁ pratiṣṭhāpitam, dhārmiko dharmarājā saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy26:754: vakṣyati ca— āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṁ hitārthaṁ kṛtsnaṁ stūpān kārayāmāsa lokam |
divy26:755: caṇḍāśokatvaṁ prāpya pūrvaṁ pṛthivyāṁ dharmāśokatvaṁ karmaṇā tena lebhe (88)|
